experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Wajah... A Reason started as a social awareness watsapp group is now an active Association of people from various spaces, segments, industries & locations. We all work very actively towards social causes such as Education, Child Abuse, Natural Calamaties.We are now an association of 5 core members & 25 participating members... All with the common objective of repaying back to society.So if there is any social Wajah... A Reason for us to help do consider us to be there.

recommendations: Sheldon Loyola ‚ÄúConsistently picking out the proverbial ‚ÄòDiamonds in the Rough‚Äô in one of the fastest growing startup economies in the world is no ordinary task. But then, nothing about Nikhil is ordinary. Nikhil brings every bit of the experience and knowledge he has garnered over two decades of work experience to the teams he leads, leading with strategic acumen and hands-on mentorship. And he is all about relationships. That is what truly sets him apart. His skin-in-the-game approach shows he‚Äôs right in there with you, guiding you through the trenches, helping you reach your goal with the kind of insight that only experience and true empathy can offer. It is no wonder that through his leadership, Marwari Catalysts (MCats) has built something far greater than your typical funding platform‚Äîit‚Äôs a community that supports, invests, and scales with purpose. I have had the pleasure of working with Nikhil, an experience I thoroughly enjoyed, and I look to opportunities in the future where I can once again. Should you get that opportunity, take it up without hesitation.‚Äù

Chintan Oza ‚ÄúI wholeheartedly endorse Nikhil Gupta, CEO of Marwari Catalysts, a visionary leader and a jolly good friend. Nikhil excels at identifying and nurturing groundbreaking startups, providing mentorship and strategic guidance. His passion for empowering entrepreneurs and creating win-win situation for all involved stakeholders makes him a standout leader in the trade. Looking forward to continuing collaboration with Nikhil in the time ahead.‚Äù
